commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Kasumi, Karin, Honoka, Nico, and Kanan, please gather around. This group is for members with bad grades overall.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Bad grades overall? I mean, you're right, but still... Are we really gonna do this?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: We sure are. Why would we joke about this?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Well, if it's not a joke, it must be a dream.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sorry, but this is all real and happening.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You can turn your back on the things you hate all you want, it won't change reality.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: *Sigh* Is studying really that important? There's plenty of other things out there that are far more important, aren't there?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, exactly! Like hard work and friendship! You can't learn those from a book!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You're telling me! The fact that there aren't any school idol lessons to begin with just proves that the problem lies with our education system.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Now, now, there's no point in arguing. Let's just calm down and accept reality.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: My, someone's being obedient today.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ahaha, I'm always obedient!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: By the way... Take a look outside! The weather is so nice. It'd be a waste to spend it cooped up studying in here, don't you think?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, I do!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Right? So let's just accept reality and go hang out somewhere together. It's way healthier that way.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I agree! All of this studying is filling up my lungs with dust! We need to breathe in some fresh air every now and then!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's right! It's important to change things up from time to time!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: If that's the case, I know just the spot!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ooh, where?!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: AHEM! Nice try, but you're not fooling me. Don't you remember what Umi just said? You can turn away all you like, it won't change the facts. Now just give it up already.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Giving up is not an option! I'm not going down without a fight!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I wish you'd say that about your grades.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I really did not want to have to say this, but I am left with no choice if you cannot understand the weight of this reality.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: All of you gathered here right now have bad grades in all subjects. In other words, you are all close to being crowned the queen dunce.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Nuh-uh! I'm not nearly as bad as Honoka is!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What? That's not true!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You're just splitting hairs here. This doesn't just apply to you two, either.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Whimper*

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You claim you just want a change of pace, but I remember you and Karin saying that you release all of your study-related stress through practice.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Kanan also said something in the same vein.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Nico and Honoka, too. In other words, none of you require any changes of pace.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: B-But...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I know it's hard to attempt to do things you're not good at. I completely understand why you might be reluctant to do so.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: However, I believe that everyone here has the strength to overcome any hardships they may face.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Besides, you aren't alone. All of us are here by your side. Let's all join forces and conquer this challenge.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: That is the very definition of hard work and friendship. It seems you can learn about them through studying after all, Honoka.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ugh, fine! We just have to suck it up and do it, right? Come on girls, let's do this.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Aww, if we have to.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: If we don't have a choice, then I suppose it'd be easier to just get it over and done with.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'd hate to be stuck doing this forever, so yeah...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'll do it, but I'm still praying that the need for studying will disappear someday.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Then let us get started.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Oh! Could you wait a moment?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: What seems to be the matter?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I don't mind studying, but could we rest for a bit first? My brain's all mush from the regular meeting, so I don't think anything I study would stick right now.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: She's right!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I agree! We should have something sweet to eat after giving our brains a workout! So how about we go out to buy some ice cream?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh come on... Give me a break, you guys.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What shall we do?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It looks like we have no choice. They will just keep pushing back if we force them too much. There does need to be some compromise here.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: If that's the case, then we'll start the study session in half an hour. I'm warning you now, it's going to be intense.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I know, I know. Give us some credit, will you?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Sigh*

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: All right! Let's go get some ice cream!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I'm on a diet, so I'll just have some tea.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! C'mon, you gotta have some ice cream with us!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What flavor should I pick? Hey, everyone! What are your favorite flavors?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: They're all so full of life as soon as it's break time. This is going to be quite the challenge.
